subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Eric Fehr scored 37 seconds into overtime Tuesday night, and the host Washington Capitals rallied from a three-goal, first-period deficit to beat the Boston Bruins, 4-3.
snippet: Eric Fehr scored 37 seconds into overtime Tuesday night, and the host Washington Capitals rallied from a three-goal, first-period deficit to beat the Boston Bruins, 4-3.
